pages.title: Detailed Auto-Crafter
pages.text: The <item>Detailed Auto-Crafter/$ is an upgraded <item>$(l:essentials/autocrafter)Auto-Crafter/$ that can craft <item>$(l:essentials:intro/path)Detailed Crafter/$ specific recipes from any <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/path)path/$.$(br2)It <em>can not/$ craft normal crafting table recipes- only <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/path)path/$ specific recipes. There is a <em>sigil slot/$ in the UI (below the arrow) that takes a

<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/path)path sigil/$. The <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/path#sigils)path sigil/$ is required to craft recipes from that <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/path)path/$, but the <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/path#sigils)path sigil/$ will not be consumed.$(br2)It works the same as a normal <item>$(l:essentials/autocrafter)Auto-Crafter/$ other than these differences.$(br2)
